name: chapter_1
title: Introduction to Simple Present Tense
description: This chapter introduces the simple present tense, explaining when and how to use it in everyday English sentences.

questions.question: Which sentence is in the simple present tense?

options.A: She is reading a book now.
options.D: I will go to the park tomorrow.

questions.question: Which of the following is correct in simple present tense?

options.A: He go to school every morning.
options.B: He goes to school every morning.
options.C: He going to school every morning.
options.D: He went to school every morning.

questions.question: When do we use the simple present tense?

options.A: To describe actions happening right now.
options.C: To describe habitual actions or facts.
